pages.title: Mountain Lion
pages.text: The cougar ($(o)Puma concolor$()) is a large cat native to the Americas.$(br2)Its range spans from the Canadian Yukon to the southern Andes in South America and is the most widespread of any large wild terrestrial mammal in the Western Hemisphere.

pages.title: Mountain Lion
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Most active during Dawn/Dusk$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:rabbit$(br2)Number of Offspring: 3$(br2)Growth time: 4 Days
